评论概述: Incredible value; looks and feels expensive
评论详情: Fit like a glove. Fabric weight and quality are nice; not too heavy and doesn’t feel “cheap”. Dress hangs straight but isn’t “clingy” and flows nicely as you walk. Silhouette very flattering. Strapless bra easily hidden by cut of armholes. Only needed to trim tulle for length. Hand beading beautiful. A couple of minor beading pulls but my tailor easily fixed. Highly recommended. I may never buy black tie anywhere else and I have purchased a lot of expensive black tie dresses over the years.

This dress is SO flattering, SO comfortable and just gorgeous on! No need for shapewear, super breathable, all the things! I rarely do reviews but had to come back for this one! I was a little concerned about the beading based on on the reviews but had absolutely no issues with it and the dress held up to a fun night of partying in a large crowd and being handled a lot going up and down stairs. Seriously! Buy it!

I had my eye on this dress for months. When it arrived the color of the fabric is off from the photo and as I was opening the package the button at the neck popped off. For the quality, I would assume this is a $50 dress, not a $150 dress. Save your money.
Beautiful sequin halter dress, just as described. Beading was lovely. Fit great. Size 2
This dress was just perfect.  The beading is exquisite... I love her line! You will not be disappointed with the quality of the dress!

I'm wearing this dress to my son's wedding in a few weeks.  It is beautiful, stylish, forgiving and comfortable.  I had only 2 alterations made to it, but well worth it.  Highly recommend  this dress.
What a beautiful dress-elegant and classic just too large in the size I ordered. Do one size down. Can be worn with a belt or without. Just stunningly made.
got this for a steal!  I'm 5' 9" and long dresses are usually too short on me.  This was a smidge too long so I could wear heals.  It was comfortable.  Shows tummy so wear spanx!
Description noted color as pink, this dress is not pink.
Whats not to like. Price was right. Dress is timeless. Daughter loved it.

评论概述: Gorgeous but could be made bettef
评论详情: This dress is so pretty but not well made. With that being said, I will wear it again if the occasion arises. But beware, the beads come off easily. But don’t let it deter you from buying it. I got lots of compliments on it.
Stunning

评论概述: It was a hit at my cousin’s wedding!
评论详情: I enjoyed having this gown on.  It was chic with all the sequins that adorned it.  I felt like it fit me well, as I felt it was true to size, and I wore it comfortably with a strapless bra.  I believe the quality is excellent for the price.  As far as the so-so side of it, the sequins are literally all over the dress.  Therefore one has to be careful.  Still, moving around through a wedding and reception with it including getting in and out of the car, there were no issues with the sequins, which to me were secure.  Extra sequins had been provided to sew on, should there ever be a need.  I would gladly recommend it.
Loved it !  Great elegant quality  Not cheaplyLooks expensive

As some of the reviews have said, beads fall off. It arrived with about 3 inches of beads missing. However since I was wearing it to a wedding sooner than later and this dress fit amazing on, I decided I could use the package of beads (yes numerous beads) that came shipped with the dress and do a little diy myself. I did not pay full price for the dress, it was 2/3 the original price, so doing a little repair was fine by me. I can sew a little, I am NOT a seamstress by any stretch of the imagination. My diy on the beads turned out great.  The waist measures exactly as defined. Beware if you have larger than average hips or bum. This dress was snug in that area on me. If you are even 1/2 inch larger than the measure for waist, size up. It is slim fit arm holes, slim fit waist, hips and upper thighs. If you are average bust, or small bust you are golden. That said I imagine if you are more well endowed that the top might be a bit snug as well.  I am average build and height, more natural pear than anything.  This dress is made with thousands of beautiful beads. Lots and lots and lots of beads. The beads make it heavier than most other dresses I own. I have had two beaded dresses in recent years, both have been noticeably heavy. Not bad, just aware kind of thing. The good is that the wind did its best to lift the dress and the dress ignored the wind.  This dress has two layers of fabric. One under the fabrics with beads. This is good as it means the skin under is protected by a nice feeling fabrics away from beads.  This also means, I would personally not wear this dress to a 100 degree outside wearing for any length of time, unless I was okay sweating a few pounds. Seriously while it is sleeveless…. It is not a summer dress.  I received numerous compliments. I ordered the pink dress, and the pink is a soft light pink…hard to describe the shade of pink. The beads are a mix of pink, rose, silverish colors, and from afar can change the appearance of the color of dress.  When I looked at pictures online I had a hard time deciding if I should wear silver, pink/rose gold or yellow gold jewelry. Answer: any. In my opinion the dress works well with any color of jewelry. You do not need a necklace, as the neckline is high. It would work with stud earrings or dangle earrings. I have short hair and did not have any issues with my hair getting caught in the beads. I can see how long hair or a hairdo with hanging hair might catch on the beads. I will say I did notice the beads on my bum when I sat in a hard chair, but less noticed when I sat in a soft chair. Wearing the dress for a few hours was comfortable. I personally do not think I would want to wear this for a long car ride to an event, or for several hours if I had to sit the whole time (for example a musical/play or ballet). I wore it to a wearing and only sat during the vows and was sitting only a little, then standing or dancing the rest of the night. The dress was perfect for me for that occasion.
Well made beautiful beading. Can be dressed up or down. Very figure flattering. Quality dress. Great price! Nice light weight.

The dress arrived in pretty poor condition missing a good amount of beading with a lot of thread coming undone. Unfortunately these were in pretty prominent areas and not easily concealed. Immediately returning!

Dress was delivered shoved into a bag and with plenty of beads and sequin already missing. I returned it. Also it was very long and for my 5’3” frame I needed to return it because even with the tallest heels I own it was too long.
There were a lot of reviews about the beading falling off so I was a bit hesitant given the price but I had no issues whatsoever with the beading. Dress was great quality and so pretty.
I purchased black, size 8. I am 5’4”, and wear size 8 in jeans. This dress fit perfectly! It was just enough beading to give an elegant look. No issues of beads falling off. I recommend.

评论概述: Beautiful Dress - with the right amount of bling
评论详情: This dress is true to size - I needed no alterations.  The price was great for this dress - I will be wearing it to my Son's Wedding.
this dress is beautiful, but it is very heavy. For a summer wedding, this one is too heavy since the event will be outdoor. I am impressed with the quality thought.

评论概述: The design is beautiful but not as expected
评论详情: The one I received It looked used lots of animal hair on garment some part on bottom area the beading was coming apart some dirt and didn't smell good. Other garments 3x I ordered before before, similar dresses I did a "try before you buy" They were in excellent condition. I returned them exactly the way I had received for they were too small or large. Please don't let this happen again I was appalled.
I was pleasantly surprised, this dress is beautiful! I was skeptical after reading some reviews, there were no sequins missing at all. I love how the dress fits and can't wait to wear it!

评论概述: Love this dress, perfect color and fit.
评论详情: Liked the way it fit! The way it fell. Size 16 5’6’ 206

I love love love EVERYTHING about this dress.  It's comfy, the waistline is perfect, nothing itchy, and nice hook and eye closure halfway down the zipper part.  My husband loved it and even bragged to our very good friend about how gorgeous I was in it (we've been married almost 26 years).  I am returning though, only to size down 1 size because I'm concerned about the length  - I'm hoping thar a size down will be a bit shorter so that I don't have to wear super high heels (numerous back surgeries and my balance is horrible on a good day!).  I'm buying this for my nephew's destination wedding in London this coming fall, and I can't wait!  Worth every penny!

I do not recommend this dress to anyone. When I took it out of the package, I could hear beads falling off my dress. The beading was off in small places all over the dress. The most noticable being the neckline where you could clearly see that the stitching was broken & beads were missing. It was not wearable!

评论概述: Terrible quality.  Unable to wear due to zipper defect.
评论详情: I bought this dress for my son's wedding.  When I went to put it on, the zipper was defective.  It was sewn too tightly into the fabric and could not be zipped up.  We tried everything to try to make it work.  At one point, we got it past the worst point but then the zipper split open below that point.  In the process, beading was coming off.  I can't return it since it's past the return window, so now it's just trash.  Very disappointed.
Esperaba con ansias el vestido y lo primero q veo al sacarlo es que viene dañado
This dress is beautiful. The beading is exquisite. It fit well. I needed a different look, otherwise I would have kept this dress.

It is made ONLY for short-waisted people with a flat chest. It doesn't look like the picture, and it's extremely unflattering and ridiculously tight in the chest. Plus, Amazon has evidently shortened the return window, so I am stuck with an over-priced, ill-fitting, unflattering, unworn dress.

评论概述: absolutely gorgeous, not quite true to size
评论详情: This is for a wedding 10 months from now, so I have time to "lose a few" or order it in a different size. It hits all the right curves and the weight of the dress is perfect, with the lining and the beading; a truly beautiful dress. I recommend sizing up if you wear 14 or larger, just so you have some zipper-room.... IYKYK
It was beautiful but it didn’t fit right

评论概述: Stunning dress - espeically for a special occassion
评论详情: This dress looks like you are on the red carpet!!! It is very flattering also. I am 5'9 1/2" and the lenght is perfect with heals.

Purchased for my nephews wedding on 10/28. How ironic that, that’s the return date expiration.. want to return because wore it once and on the way to the wedding button popped off! Ok not a deal but as we were taking pictures my sis pointed out that a 3in+ section of sequins was gone! I was modified but what could I do…. And looks like I’m stuck w a defective dress
The dress was a perfect fit. Unfortunately, there were many sections that the beads were falling off the dress. I didn’t think the dress was worth the money with the beads falling off.

I was super impressed with how well the dress is made and how great it looks on.  I got the green colored one and tried it on as soon as it came in the mail (3 days after order).  It fits perfectly and looks like a million dollars!  I am 5'7" about 138 lbs and typically wear a size 8 dress.  This fit perfectly.

评论概述: Pretty dress but back fit odd
评论详情: The blush color is pretty and I had no issues with the beading as others described.  Overall the dress fit and the length was perfect for my 5'9" frame but the back puckered weirdly and was not flattering so it was returned.
Loved the dress but ultimately returned because I felt it was too tight in the bust for my event. Would be lovely if you were below a DD.
NA

This dress was beautiful and I was excited to wear to a black tie wedding. I had read reviews that the beading falls off and also the beading rubs up against your underarm and is uncomfortable. I hoped for the best but sadly both were true. After spending $200 on this, the beading fell apart the first time I wore it AT the wedding. Very disappointing.

I wore this dress once - I was standing most of the night.  I noticed that the beading was falling off - not even in places you would think, like on my bottom area where you do sit, or along where the seat belt would rub - but on the front of the dress.  Once I noticed it I touched the beads and they we just falling off, they are glued on and I don't think they used super glue.  I LOVED the dress but the beads falling off... not so great
I bought this for a wedding and it was perfect! Compliments all night. Outstanding quality and very flattering!

I ordered this dress for my daughter's wedding. It looked really really bad on me, but my OTHER daughter tried it and it looked wonderful on her, so she wore it for her sister's wedding! Worked out great, and I eventually found a different dress. Happy ending.
Lightweight and fits perfect.
I haven’t worn it yet but it’s beautiful. Very flattering. I’m 5’5” and with 3 inch heels I don’t need to have it hemmed.

I bought this dress for a wedding and fell in love with it when I put it on. However, I was rushing and I didn’t really give a ton of attention to the back though. Thank goodness I tried it on again a week before the wedding. There was a sewing mishap towards the middle of the back where the fabric was scrunched. Worse we’re all the strands of beads coming undone. I got it on sale for $119, tried to exchange it and all I could do was return it. I loved it so much, that I bought it again for $199. Only to receive another dress that the beads were unraveling throughout. I was really bummed out, the quality of the fabric was worth the price and the parts of the beading that weren’t falling apart were beautiful.
MAKE SURE YOU CHECK THE BEADS ON DRESS.  I DIDN'T LOOK CLOSE ENOUGH AND THE BEADS ON THE BACK OF DRESS WERE COMING OFF.  THEY DID EXCHANGE DRESS OTHERWISE DRESS IS BEAUTIFUL!!

This dress is gorgeous and very flattering.  There is a lot of threadwork for all of the beads and a beautiful, intricate pattern.  The dress is heavier than expected and it has an additional lining underneath.  My only complaint is that the beading along the edges of the arms scratches you repeatedly and I had irritated skin and little cuts on the underside of my upper arms from rubbing against the dress.  Otherwise, I love the dress.

I bought two sizes in this dress. I'm a size 16 in pants, so I bought the 16 and 18. They fit very similarly. I would have chosen the 18 but the beading had fallen off right in the front. No way to hide it, and for the price, that should not happen.

So this is pretty—very architectural and art deco looking. It’s a bit heavy, a tiny bit itchy, and some of the beadwork came undone. I’m in a 12, 5’6” and had 3” heels on and it was dragging the floor. Put all of that together and it’s going back.

This is a flattering dress for your figure.  It is just the dress that would be needed for a formal occasion like a wedding (which I purchased it for -- mother of the bride).  A few beads fell, but mostly they stayed intact.  The color is champagne with gold like sparkles.  The tuille is cut, not hemmed - and I believe it is supposed to be that way because of that type of material.  The lining does not have a see-thru vibe which is great.  The dress is very well made.  You will probably need a crisscross bra because of the design in the back or a stick on.  It is flattering dress that is modest, dressy, and classy.
Love it and can’t wait to wear it on my best friend’s wedding!
Beautiful gown! I ordered a Sz small and it fit like a glove. Just had to be hemmed I’m 5’6
We reordered the correct size and are very pleased.

评论概述: Nice dress ,nice fit not the right color for me
评论详情: I like it fit well but the color looks more beige than blush.

I'm a DD and was shocked at how tight it was. The neck was so tight it choked me. I don't have a thick neck. Very very disappointed. It's beautiful. Without shoes off it wasn't too long. I'm  5’6.8. I can see how easily the beads can fall off.
This dress was exquisitely beautiful! It was comfortable and the Art Deco design was very chic!
Great product, well made. Beading is very pretty.

评论概述: Very beautiful pale blush color!  Fits well!
评论详情: The pale blush color is beautiful!  It fits well in the length (w heels), hips and draped bust line.  Not too heavy and very flattering!  Great change from LBD!
Very good quality and design.

I wore this dress to a wedding and I am deeply obsessed. It is so beautiful! The color (cassis) is as pictured. It fit as expected, and length was perfect with my roughly 2” heels (I am 5’7” wearing a size 14). I was surprised how well this dress hides my bulgier areas, like stomach and love handles. I thought it was going to be much clingier. It does have some weight to it because of the beads, but I barely noticed it at all. I did have a lot of beads along the zipper fall off the first 1 or 2 times I tried it on. But they were right along the zipper and you can’t even tell that any are missing. I was really worried about beads falling off throughout the night, but was VERY pleasantly surprised to find no missing beads! Something to consider with the beaded style is it might be difficult to wear a shall without it getting stuck on the beads.

This dress is so beautiful! The beading detail is so nice and the fit surprisingly was near perfect other than length. I am 5'0 and around 104 lbs so I often have a hard time finding dresses that fit nicely without needing to get them taken in but this one was great. The length is VERY long though..so will need hemming. The beading ups the price for that as well so just be aware.  Only negative is when I was wearing to my event it seemed to lose some beads randomly. Nothing real noticeable but when I got up I saw some loose beads on the seat...Won't wear this that frequently though so it's fine.

评论概述: The dress is beautiful and fits perfectly!

El vestido esta muy Bonito,  se adapta muy bien a cualquier tipo de Cuerpo. Mi problema fue que me lo mandaron usado. Llano de deodorants. Y con la lentejuela muy maltratada y en unas areas ya no la tenia.  Asi me lo puse Parque ya no tenia tempo de regresarlo. Y obvio termino en la basura😒🤬
I loved this dress. The color and fit were great, but when I took it out of the package beads fell of and continued to fall off when I tried it on. If not for that I would have kept it.

I ordered based on my measurements. Website suggested a 12!!! So, I ordered a 12. I could have worn an 8 I think. Not enough time to mess around with sizes. Dress was about 6" too long even factoring 3" heals.
Runs long, so I wore tall heals, 3”. Very elegant and classy.

It is beautiful

This is a very pretty dress, but it is very heavy due to the beads.  Also I have beads on my floor from just trying it on.  Sizing is accurate (I'm 5'8", 155 lbs and normally wear an 8...size 8 fit well).  Also, the cut of the dress is flattering for people with problematic mid sections.

I kept this dress the full 7 days of the try before you buy. I tried it on multiple times and really liked. It wasn’t what I really needed but I was trying to justify keeping it for something else. In the end I sent it back. Not the dresses fault at all.

Just wore this for my sons wedding and got a ton of compliments on it.  I am 5'8" and wore just over 3" heals so it does have extra lenth to it for that. It was comfortable and cool as it was in the 90's the day of the wedding. I am so happy with the decision to go with this dress.
Beautiful dress but beading started falling off before the wedding and progressively got worse as the day went on. Very disappointed.

This is a beautiful, evening gown! I love the dresses Adrianna Pappel designs and this was no disappointment. However, considering the cost of this beaded evening gown, I was appalled and very disappointed, in how it was shipped! This dress was folded in a sealed clear plastic bag , no hanger, and then shipped in a 5x7 in. Plastic Amazon mailing envelope! There was no care taken for the delicate beading on the dress or the delicate chiffon material.  I will never order a formal gown from Amazon again

评论概述: Fit was great, beading is iffy

There is a large pack of extra beading provided, but for over $200 I wanted the dress to be ready to wear without sewing involved! This would be a solid choice if you need a quick dress shipped for a single wear.
Beautiful dress. It is well made and fits true to size. Unless you are super tall it will need to be hemmed. I returned it only because it was too formal for the event I was attending.

Don't write a lot of reviews, but this dress deserved one.  This was a last minute order for a dressy event.  It came on time and the quality was great.  I am 5'9 about 128 and the size 6 fit perfectly.  I had tried on several dresses at retail stores while waiting for this one to arrive, and am I ever glad I didn't purchase any of the other selections.  I got sooo many compliments.  I didn't need to hem it and my slightly heeled sandles were perfect for it.  There is area with no beading on the bottom that you could hem if needed.  The blush color was elegant, form fitting (but not too much) and flowing in all the right places.  Looking forward to wearing again.
Love the fit of this gown. I am 5”3, 120lbs. Size fits me perfectly except for the length.
Mother of the bride dress!  I ordered size 14, and 16 to try for size.  Send 2 size 14's.  14 fit perfect,  so sent 1 back.
Loved this dress but if you have narrow shoulders, pick a different style.

This dress is so pretty. The beading is gorgeous and the color is very pale peach with a hint of blush pink.  If that makes sense... I uploaded pics without a bra on and with a few more pounds than I will have by the time I wear this dress.  I’m 5’1 150 pounds and it fit just slight snug. I got the size 8.  I absolutely need to take off at least six inches in order for the hem to hit at my ankle like in the display pic.  My only concern is the wedding I’m going to is in June and with the beads it’s a fairly heavy dress so I’m hoping I don’t sweat in it.
I always wanted to buy this dress. The fabric is so good. I like the fit and color and the beed work on the dress. I got lots of appreciation for this dress. This is a pretty dress for everyone.

I usually have trouble with formal dresses so ordered a couple sizes up. I usually wear a 12/14 but ordered a 16 and was very happy with the fit. The cut of the dress is perfect for my larger stomach area. Quite long, but as a 5ft 2in person I am very used to this so gave heels to help out.
Gorgeous dress and the detail put into it is pretty impressive. It is def a heavy dress and scratched the underarm a bit from the beads but all in all a great buy.

Let me start by saying that I have never spent $200 on a dress before. I figure, why do that when I can find a cute one at Ross for $20? I threw this into my prime wardrobe cart, and like every time before thought "no big deal about the price, I won't like it anyways". Boy was I wrong. This dress is BEAUTIFUL and the quality is great. I don't even have anywhere to wear it, but I loved it too much to pass up! It's a bit heavy, but has intricate beading so to be expected. I highly recommend this to anybody looking for a pretty event dress that can be worn time and time again!

This dress is gorgeous & just as described. Well made with such beautiful detail. I did get it hemmed to my height but I knew that when I ordered. Would recommend Adrianna dresses. Will be standing very confident at my sons wedding in this dress.
not happy at all with the quality 😪
